EntryName	RBTN2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Rhombotin-2 (Cysteine-rich protein TTG-2) (LIM domain only protein 2) (LMO-2) (T-cell translocation protein 2)
GeneName	LMO2 RBTN2 RBTNL1 RHOM2 TTG2
Length	158
Function	Acts with TAL1/SCL to regulate red blood cell development. Also acts with LDB1 to maintain erythroid precursors in an immature state.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
